The Vniversalist examined and convicted, destitute of plaine sayings of Scripture or evidence of reason in answer to a treatise entituled The University of Gods free grace in Christ to mankind / by Obadiah Howe, Pastor of Stickney in Lincoln-shire. Howe, Obadiah, 1615 or 16-1683.
[100], 141-223 p.
Printed for John Rothwell, [London] : 1648.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======

[100], 141-223 p.
Printed for John Rothwell, [London] : 1648.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
